ai.skymind.pipelines.normalizer

Class CustomImagePreProcessingScaler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.skymind.pipelines.normalizer.CustomImagePreProcessingScaler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.DataSetPreProcessor, org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.preprocessor.DataNormalization, org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.preprocessor.Normalizer<org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.DataSet>

    public class CustomImagePreProcessingScaler
extends Object
implements org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.preprocessor.DataNormalization
    Created by susaneraly on 6/23/16. A preprocessor specifically for images that applies min max scaling Can take a range, so pixel values can be scaled from 0 to 255 to minRange to maxRange default minRange = 0 and maxRange = 1; If pixel values are not 8 bits, you can specify the number of bits as the third argument in the constructor For values that are already floating point, specify the number of bits as 1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
